snippet.title: Metaverser Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Metaverser is the first multiplayer open-world blockchain game where you can play with a 3D avatar created based on your features.Metaverser offers play-to-earn models.The game mixes the world of finance and gaming, providing players with opportunities to generate an income while they play. Players will have more control by adding real-world value to their online entertainment.They can participate in the game challenges, earn MTVTs and NFTs, and sell them at the marketplace and cryptocurrency exchanges. Assets are minted as non-fungible tokens (NFTs) and can be often traded on platforms outside the game’s universe.The magic of Metaverser is that whales are not the only winners in the game. Only the players with the right strategy and a certain amount of luck can get the final victory.Players can travel in the game using ports, train stations, and airports, complete missions, and earn real money alongside fulfilling their sense of curiosity in the process.Whether users are serious card players or DeFi enthusiasts, they can find their own happiness in Metaverser. 

https://metaverser.me
